titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the United Steelworkers of America Local 1843 Records, 1937-1999 AIS.2000.05
titlestmt.author: Zachary Brodt.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:36:28 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: United Steelworkers of America Local 1843 Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United Steelworkers of America. Local 1843 (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

did.abstract: United Steelworkers of America, Local 1843 was founded in 1937 and represented workers at the Jones & Laughlin Steel mill in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. This collection includes seniority lists, agreements, membership cards and negotiation information from Local 1843.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Vincent Mackewich, president of Local 1843, in 2000.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: United Steelworkers of America, Local 1843 was founded in 1937 as part of the Steelworkers Organizing Committee and represented workers at the Jones & Laughlin Steel Corporation mill in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The union continued to represent workers at the plant after it became part of LTV Steel and up to the plant's closure in 1999.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: United Steelworkers of America Local 1843 Records, 1937-1999, AIS.2000.05, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United Steelworkers of America Local 1843 Records, 1937-1999, AIS.2000.05, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: An inventory to this collection was created by Archives Service Center staff.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Jones & Laughlin Steel Corporation, Pittsburgh Works Earning Records, 1862-1901, AIS.1974.23, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
Jones & Laughlin Steel Corporation Historical Records, 1871-1953, AIS.1973.07, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
Jones & Laughlin Steel Corporation Records, 1902-1959, AIS.1978.09, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
Jones & Laughlin Steel Corporation, Pittsburgh Works Records, 1918-1970, AIS.1988.07, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection includes seniority lists, agreements, and negotiation information of United Steelworkers Local 1843 at the Jones & Laughlin steel mill on the South Side (Pittsburgh) and Hazelwood. Also present are membership cards from 1937 to 1954, arbitration information and grievances.
